subject: Re: A new concept-- I asked a question.
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
I heard "Thanks Kid, It's me Randall" at the end of the file.

-Steve H.


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> 
wrote:
>
> 
>  This is after I changed the echo box speakers, and I wanted to 
test the panel mic. The panel mic can be turned on and off, and 
doesn't come through the monitor speaker to prevent feedback. 
>  
>  I asked about guides, and a voice said "ok" then I asked again, 
and it was like it took a couple attempts to say "Randal Is Here" ( 
I think). I have heard the name a few times over the last month or 
so. 
>  
>  Frank-S
> _________________________________________________________________
> Windows Live Hotmail and Microsoft Office Outlook  together at 
last. Get it now.

pid=CL100626971033
